raw_body: Son of the late William Kokmaduwa Gamage and the late Daisy Gamage (nee Jayasinghe), husband of Girty (nee Abeywickrama), father of Rajiv and Yasantha, father-in-law of Thuseimi (nee Walpita), grandfather of Kiyara and Liana, brother of Manel, Thilak and Suranganee (all deceased), brother-in-law of Carl Hapuarachchi, Priyalal Wickramasuriya (both deceased), Nimalka (nee Wijayatilake), Chandra Abeywickrama, Thamadara Munideva and TharangaAbeysingh
